description: This file defines a Java class 'UtilityPaymentResponse' which serves as a data model for utility payment responses in a REST API. It uses Lombok annotations to generate boilerplate code.

classes.name: UtilityPaymentResponse
classes.description: A data model class representing the response for utility payment operations, containing message and transaction ID fields.

methods.name: getter and setter methods for message and transactionId
methods.description: Generated by Lombok's @Data annotation, providing accessors and mutators for the fields.
